content.title: Final Stretch!
content.creator:
Aaron
March 26, 2025
content.content: We are in the last 5 days of the campaign! I am already working on a second box in hopes that there is enough interest in this project. I just uploaded a video of the box and the board controlling it that will be inside acting as the brains you must out-wit to open the chest. Note: There is a $15 delivery that was used as a cushion but may be used toward extras if costs are covered!
